explanation: [0-0] In a room, three people in costumes are sitting on chairs. The woman on the left has red flame-like hair and wears a red top and skirt. The woman in the middle wears white feathers, and the man on the right wears a white top and has blue hair. Behind them, a man in burlap clothing with grass on his head stands. The wall of the room is painted with a blue sky and white clouds, while the cabinet next to it is decorated with patterns of bubbles and flames. At the top of the screen are several emoji patterns, and in the center, there is a white number three.

[0-2] When the number changes to one, the man standing in the back takes out a blue vacuum cleaner, and the first emoji in the upper back starts to change. The woman in the middle stands up in terror and runs to the left, while the men on the left and right also show frightened expressions as they sit in their chairs.
